register_page.title: welcome to kendamanomics
register_page.app_description: kendamanomics is an app to help players progress their Kendama skill
register_page.app_ranking_description: we also have a ranking system that ranks players based on tricks laced and competitions won
register_page.fill_in_fields: please make sure to fill in your information correctly:

helpers.email: Email is not in the correct format
helpers.password: Password is not in the correct format
helpers.code: Code is not in the correct format
helpers.name: Name is not in the correct format
helpers.last_name: Last name is not in the correct format
helpers.company_name: Company name is not in the correct format
helpers.years_playing: Years playing is not in the correct format

snackbar.error_email_register: This email is already in use
snackbar.error_server: There was an error with the server
snackbar.error_user_exists: User with given email already exists

upload_trick.exceeds_40_mb: Video is larger than 40mb, the upload might take some time.
upload_trick.video_uploading_5s: Video is still uploading, please wait...
upload_trick.error_video_too_large: Selected video is too large. Please check the instructions by tapping the info button.
upload_trick.error_unknown: Unkown error occured. Please try again, or report a bug in settings

leaderboards.empty_placeholder: Complete your first trick to compete with other players

dialogs.permissions: allow Kendamanomics to access your photos and videos?
